makeNA

makeNA.Rd

makeNA takes a dataframe and converts n_missing random values into the default value of value_NA.

makeNA(data, n_missing = 10, value_NA = NA)

Arguments

data

an object of class data.frame to apply missing values.
n_missing

an object of class int specifying NA values in the returned data frame. Default is 10.
value_NA

value to specified in the data frame. Default parameter is NA.

Value

data.frame object

Examples

data(mtcars)
makeNA(mtcars)
